パッケージ jp.summit_tech.controller

クラス HomeController

Object
BaseController
HomeController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/home")
public class HomeController
extends BaseController
Controller for the page to enter projects data and links data, files data

  • コンストラクタの概要

    コンストラクタ 
    コンストラクタ 説明
    HomeController()  

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ メソッド 説明
    String doDeleteFileLink​(String data)
    Delete one file data.
    String doDeleteLink​(String data)
    Delete one link data.
    String doDeleteProject​(String data)
    Delete one project data and some links data, files data.
    ModelAndView doGet​(Principal principal, HttpSession session)
    Call projects data and links data, files data, and set them on the page.
    ModelAndView doPost​(@Valid ProjectForm projectForm, BindingResult br, Principal principal, HttpSession session)
    Register projects data and links data, files data, and redisplay the page.
    ProjectForm init()
    Get new ProjectForm.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • HomeController

      public HomeController()

  • メソッドの詳細

    • init

      @ModelAttribute public ProjectForm init()
      Get new ProjectForm.
      戻り値:
      New ProjectForm

    • doGet

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public ModelAndView doGet​(Principal principal, HttpSession session)
      Call projects data and links data, files data, and set them on the page.
      パラメータ:
      principal - Principal has login id (not null)
      session - Information between an HTTP client and an HTTP serverSession. It has token String (not null)
      戻り値:
      ModelAndView for home set projects data and links data, files data to form object.(not null)

    • doPost

      @RequestMapping(method=POST) public ModelAndView doPost​(@Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid ProjectForm projectForm, BindingResult br, Principal principal, HttpSession session)
      Register projects data and links data, files data, and redisplay the page.
      パラメータ:
      projectForm - Form to post projects data and links data, files data (not null, but projectForm.projectList can be empty)
      br - BindingResult for form validation (not null)
      principal - Principal has login id (not null)
      session - Information between an HTTP client and an HTTP serverSession. It has token String (not null)
      戻り値:
      ModelAndView for home set projects data and links data, files data to form object.(not null)

    • doDeleteProject

      @ResponseBody @RequestMapping(value="/deleteproject", method=POST) public String doDeleteProject​(@RequestBody String data) throws Exception
      Delete one project data and some links data, files data.
      パラメータ:
      data - JSON object for ajax to delete one project data and some links data, files data (not null, not blank. Id is required)
      戻り値:
      Deleted project id (not null, not blank)
      例外:
      Exception - DB exception, file delete exception

    • doDeleteLink

      @ResponseBody @RequestMapping(value="/deletelink", method=POST) public String doDeleteLink​(@RequestBody String data) throws Exception
      Delete one link data.
      パラメータ:
      data - JSON object for ajax to delete one link data (not null, not blank. Id is required)
      戻り値:
      Deleted link id (not null, not blank)
      例外:
      Exception - DB exception, file delete exception

    • doDeleteFileLink

      @ResponseBody @RequestMapping(value="/deletefile", method=POST) public String doDeleteFileLink​(@RequestBody String data) throws Exception
      Delete one file data.
      パラメータ:
      data - JSON object for ajax to delete one file data (not null, not blank. Id is required)
      戻り値:
      Deleted file id (not null, not blank)
      例外:
      Exception - DB exception, file delete exception
